# vDSP_vsimpsD

**Function**

Performs Simpson integration over a double-precision vector.

## Declaration

```swift
extern void vDSP_vsimpsD(const double * __A, vDSP_Stride __IA, const double * __B, double * __C, vDSP_Stride __IC, vDSP_Length __N);
```

## Discussion

This function is the same as [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vDSP_vsimps], except for the types of vectors `A` and `C` and scalar `*S`.

## Simpson Integration

- **vDSP_vsimps**: Performs Simpson integration over a single-precision vector.

items.description: Performs Simpson integration over a single-precision vector.
